thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 05 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Jones Energy Provides Operations Update, 2017 Year-End Reserves And 2018 Guidance

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Jones Energy Provides Operations Update, 2017 Year-End Reserves And 2018 Guidance
text:
Feb 5 (Reuters) - Jones Energy Inc:
* JONES ENERGY, INC. PROVIDES OPERATIONS UPDATE, 2017 YEAR-END RESERVES AND 2018 GUIDANCE
* JONES ENERGY INC - ‍Q4 2017 AVERAGE PRODUCTION OF APPROXIMATELY 21,200 BOE/D​
* JONES ENERGY INC - SEES INITIAL 2018 CAPITAL BUDGET OF $150 MILLION
* JONES ENERGY INC - ‍2018 FULL-YEAR PRODUCTION GUIDANCE OF 19,300 TO 21,500 BOE/D​
* JONES ENERGY INC - ‍Q1 2018 PRODUCTION GUIDANCE OF 19,200 TO 21,400 BOE/D​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
